movies.title: SUPERMAN
movies.description: Superman embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent. He faces challenges from Lex Luthor's war profiteering and a government-created clone named 'Ultraman'. Superman teams up with other heroes like Hawkgirl and Green Lantern to stop Ultraman, while Lois Lane and the Daily Planet staff work to expose Luthor's crimes. Starring David Corenswet, Rachel Brosnahan, and Nicholas Hoult, Superman is a triumph, summer movie entertainment at its best! Rated PG (violence, coarse lang) 2 hours 10 minutes.

movies.title: F1: The Movie
movies.description: **Plays for 2 weeks** Dubbed 'the greatest that never was,' Sonny Hayes was FORMULA 1's most promising phenom of the 1990s until an accident nearly ended his career. Thirty years later, he's approached by his former teammate Ruben Cervantes, to come back to FORMULA 1 for one last shot at saving the team and being the best in the world. He'll drive alongside Joshua Pearce, the team's hotshot rookie intent on setting his own pace. Truly one of the most entertaining movies of the year that will keep you on edge cheering & possibly have your jaw on the floor with the astonishing racing scenes and locations, and a great cast that includes Brad Pitt, Javier Bardem, and Damson Idris. Fl: The Movie is the very definition of a crowd-pleaser.

movies.title: Jurassic World: Rebirth
movies.description: Five years after the events of Jurassic World Dominion, an expedition braves isolated equatorial regions to extract DNA from three massive prehistoric creatures for a groundbreaking medical breakthrough. Jurassic World Rebirth is a must-see big-screen adventure that captures the nostalgic spirit of Jurassic Park filled with breathtaking thrills and a terrific cast that includes Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Bailey, and Mahershala Ali.
